author: Brian Feldman
title: NJ Governor Requests Expertise of 6 People Who Still Know COBOL
description: Why the effort to mitigate the coronavirus now means mobilizing coders who still know the decades-old programming language.
content: As the coronavirus crisis in the United States continues, practically every piece of public infrastructure will undergo unprecedented stress. Hospitals in various states have begun exceeding capacity, the White House is aiming for a best-case scenario of 100,… [+5995 chars]
